modName: The Wise Wolf Holo - Spice and Wolf
summary: I could not make a follower correctly(face always goes strange), so I make a save file by suggested.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Made a follower of my Holo character, but it may be a little bit different due to technical problem.
[/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73376/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73376/?[/url][/size]



Required:

Calyps Animal Ears - cat wolf fox cow - Craftable headwear

HDT Tails Wearable
so you'll need HDT-PE, too.

Obl Hair pack
which is deleted on Nexus, 1 of it's hair style

Enhanced Character Edit

Adorable face


Feel free to ask, English is not my native but i'll try.
author: rm8rockman
